attributes.action: Allow UK Passport Holders to enter the UK without quarantine from Qatar.
attributes.additional_details: Removing the quarantine for vaccinated British Citizens / UK Passport Holders who also provide a negative PCR will allow Expats, Families and trade / business to continue travel freely between the UK and Qatar and allow continued relations between both countries while supporting British Citizens living abroad.
attributes.background: The Government to remove the quarantine for arriving British Citizens / UK Passport Holders who are vaccinated and provide a negative PCR on arrival from Qatar.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584022.
